import { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import './css/bulma.min.css'; function App() { const [ countValue, setCountValue ] = useState(0); const increaseValue = () => {setCountValue(countValue + 1)}; const decreaseValue = () => {setCountValue(countValue - 1)}; const resetValue = () => {setCountValue(0)}; return (
Three Four
Five Six
Seven Eight
Nine Ten
Eleven Twelve
{countValue}
); } export default App;
